title: GitHub Actions Frequently used setting summary
body: ## Turn the test at any time If you ignite in all cases in both Push and Pull Request, the same content test will fire twice on Pull Request. Therefore, the ACTIONS is ignited when the Pull Request is created/Pull Request is updated (pushed to Master). `` `YML ON: Push: Branches: -Master Pull_request: Types: -Opened -synchronize `` ` ## Turn processing during the specified time zone. Actions can be turned with cron. Enter the characters in the `cron: ***` characters according to any cron notation. Must be specified in UTC. * Do not use if strict time processing is required because it is not executed at the exact time. When the process was executed with `0 0 * * *`, it was executed around 9:30 JST. Reference: [CRONTAB GURU] (https://crontab.guru/) `` `YML ON: Schedule: -cron: '0 0 * * *' `` ` ## Cash any directory `` `YML Jobs: DEPLOY: RUNS-ON: Ubuntu-Latest Strategy: Matrix: Node-Version: ['16'] Steps: -uses: Actions/checkout@v2 -uses: Actions/cache@v2 with: Key: 'Assets-2022-04-01' PATH: ./portal/src/assets/ `` ` ## Save/use cache (NPM) `` `YML Jobs: Lint: RUNS-ON: Ubuntu-Latest Strategy: Matrix: Node-Version: ['16'] Steps: -uses: Actions/checkout@v2 -uses: Actions/setup-node@v2 with: node-version: $ {{matrix.node-version}}}} Cache: 'NPM' cache-depenceNchi-path: Portal/Package-lock.json `` ` ## Save/use cache (PIP) `` `YML Jobs: DEPLOY: RUNS-ON: Ubuntu-Latest Steps: -uses: Actions/checkout@v2 -uses: Actions/setup-python@v3 with: Python-version: '3.10' Cache: 'Pip' cache-depenceNDY-PATH: 'Requirements.lock.txt' `` `
